rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 408px; height: 1px; padding-top: 40px; margin-left: 36px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 128, 240), rgb(50, 160, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 121px; height: 1px; padding-top: 325px; margin-left: 29px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 128, 240), rgb(50, 160, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 128, 0), rgb(206, 97, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(255, 128, 0), rgb(206, 97, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 128, 0), rgb(206, 97, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(255, 128, 0), rgb(206, 97, 0));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(204, 204, 204), rgb(62, 62, 62));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 486px; margin-left: 131px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FF8000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#FF8000, #ce6100); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
shadow.normalBias
に負の値を設定した場合

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 308px; height: 1px; padding-top: 355px; margin-left: 86px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FF0000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#FF0000, #ff9090); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 525px; margin-left: 307px;
